name: Cutting Board
description: One of the most basic tools you need in your kitchen is a good cutting board. You’ll be using it every time you cook, so it’s important to choose one that’s durable and well designed.

name: Tatin Tray
description: Fill your kitchen with versatility with this tatin tart tray perfect for baking vegetables, meat and pasta, preparing sweet and savory tarts, delicious desserts and gratins.

name: Stainless Cooking Pot
description: Cook a dinner worth remembering in this rustic pot reminiscent of times gone by. Perfect for preparing, presenting and even storing food.

name: Knife Beech
description: The 3 mm-thick blade remains rigid and stable when cutting. A continuous cutting edge that frees up the heel of the blade to make it easier to sharpen.

name: Garlic Press
description: Avoid mess and garlic hands with this innovative garlic press, the clever 2-piece design includes a scraping tool to remove the crushed garlic once the cloves have been pressed.

name: Coarse Grater
description: The Zyliss SmoothGlide Coarse Grater Is perfect for cheese lovers who enjoy a coarse grate to add to cooking.

name: Kitchen Cutlery
description: Designed with a silver silicone head and a rounded handle of solid acacia, these handsome utensils are ideal for all prep and cooking tasks.

name: Pasta Strainer
description: Tiny, closely spaced holes mean your food drains fast without having to tilt the bowl. The stable draining ring base won’t tip over and won’t leave your food sitting in a puddle.
